Plugin.Details: This plugin contains all of the Flink SpotBugs detectors.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: You cannot access to package-private method which is annotated by @VisibleForTesting.
BugPattern.LongDescription: You cannot access to package-private method which is annotated by @VisibleForTesting. This annotation means that visibility was widened only for test code, so your implementation code shouldn't access to method which is annotated by this annotation.
